hero.title: Chartoon — Lightweight, fast and beautiful charts
hero.desc: A vanilla JavaScript charting library built with D3.js. Easily embed Bar, Line, Pie, World charts and animate them with customization.

items.title: Lightweight & performance focused
items.desc: Built with vanilla JS, provides high performance with a tiny bundle.

items.title: Powered by D3.js
items.desc: Leverage the flexibility of D3 to build powerful visualizations.

items.title: Easy API
items.desc: Integrate quickly with a simple and predictable API.

items.desc: Shape colors, animations and interactions to fit your project.
